title: Untiltable
body: I'm currently sitting on a 10 game loss streak, and I've realized that I'm un-tiltable. Throughout the entire experience I haven't gotten very frustrated/infuriated at any point. I honestly don't understand why people get so upset, like do they not realize that they're just making things harder for them selves. Like jeez fam, not lit eh?
